data.title: Xiahong Lin / Bodhi
data.content:
Founder of Bodhi prediction market.
Graduated in Statistical Machine Learning
from Purdue University.
Rich experience in development and
crypto industry, has developed Twitter for Android.

data.title: Motoko Eio / The Bank of Japan
data.content:
Graduated from University of Tokyo.
Used to be an economic adviser
to the Bank of Japan.
Participating in the formulation of
monetary policy of Japan.

data.title: Jason Fang / Sora Ventures
data.content: Founding Partner of Sora Ventures.Used to work for Fenbu-shi Capital and Juzhen Financials. Mentor at Alchemist Accelerator and Startupbootcamp in Silicon Valley

data.title: Jim De Wild / McGill University
data.content:
Famous venture capitalist and management educator.
Used to manage and invest over $5 billion.
Doctor of political science and
tenured professor at McGill University.

data.title: Alex Mashinsky / CEO of Celsius
data.content:
Early developer of VoIP protocol
One of the leading evangelists of web-based
exchangesProminent entrepreneur who has founded several companies over the years, including GroundLink, Transit Wireless, Elematics and Arbinet

data.title: Hon. Ernie Eves / GIC
data.content:
Founder and President of GIC group.
Rich experience in investment and management.
Has a very unique understanding and insight
to the foreign exchange market,
international trade and monetary policy

data.title: Patrick Dai / Founder of Qtum
data.content:
Dropout from the Chinese Academy of Sciences
Used to work for Alibaba Group.
Rich experience in the development
of blockchain technology and management
and striving to push the blockchain technology
to mainstream at an early date
